item.description:
Informational Only.   I am posting this in case anyone is interested in visiting.  No need to sign up.
http://www.themovingwall.org/

It is open for viewing 24hours a day from July 12th through July 16th.
A Dedication Ceremony will be held on Saturday, July 14 at 12 noon at Brown Football Field. The program will feature music, readings, a gun salute and more.
The Vietnam Veterans “Moving Wall” Memorial is the half sized replica of the Washington, DC Vietnam Veterans Memorial and has been touring the country for more than 20 years. The “Moving Wall” allows a greater number of Americans to experience the Memorial. Many family, friends and fellow veterans who are not able to travel to Washington to view the permanent Memorial now have an opportunity to visit and experience the power of the “Moving Wall” and perhaps see the name of a relative or friend. Anyone who has had the opportunity to visit the permanent exhibit in Washington, DC can attest to the emotional impact this exhibit has for everyone who visits it.

group.name: Lebanon/White River Junction Hiking Meetup Group

item.name: Visit the Moving Wall.
